tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recruitment_strategies (
	strategy_id INT,
	strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
	cost DECIMAL,
	time_to_fill INT,
	conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_results (
    result_id INT,
    strategy_id INT,
    time_to_fill INT,
    cost_per_hire DECIMAL,
    candidate_conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE recruitment_data (
    recruitment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    time_to_fill_days INT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL
);
